TextLibrary.Text: Elistara
Halt! Who are you? What are you doing here at Eldros' Tower?
Halt! Who are you? What are you doing here at Eldros' Tower?
Halt! Who are you? What are you doing here at Eldros' Tower?
Halt! Who are you? What are you doing here at Eldros' Tower?
I'm looking for a way into the Realms of Death.
I'm looking for a way into the Realms of Death.
I'm looking for a way into the Realms of Death.
I'm looking for a way into the Realms of Death.
The Realms of Death? You do not look like one of the Undead. What earthly reason could a living creature have for traveling there?
The Realms of Death? You do not look like one of the Undead. What earthly reason could a living creature have for traveling there?
The Realms of Death? You do not look like one of the Undead. What earthly reason could a living creature have for traveling there?

Lord Bane has been capturing my people - taking them as slaves - and stealing the metal from our mines. I'm going to stop him!
Lord Bane has been capturing my people - taking them as slaves - and stealing the metal from our mines. I'm going to stop him!
Lord Bane has been capturing my people - taking them as slaves - and stealing the metal from our mines. I'm going to stop him!
Lord Bane has been capturing my people - taking them as slaves - and stealing the metal from our mines. I'm going to stop him!
All by yourself?
All by yourself?
All by yourself?
All by yourself?
If that's what it takes.
If that's what it takes.
If that's what it takes.
If that's what it takes.
I see...
I see...
I see...
I see...
I am Elistara of the Dragonknights. Travel with me to Ylarie. There is something there you must see.
